Geothermal Power Plant.Description: Geothermal power plants harness the heat energy from the Earth's core, which is known as geothermal energy, to generate electricity.
Geothermal power plants often use heat pumps to transfer heat from the Earth's core to generate electricity.
Hot springs are natural sources of geothermal energy and are often utilized by geothermal power plants for electricity generation.
Geothermal power plants are often situated near volcanoes as they provide a readily available source of geothermal energy.
